title: Time Class
description: Represents a box that displays time/duration value.

constructors.title: constructor(element: HTMLElement)
constructors.description: Initializes a new instance of the Time class from element.

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: The element for which to create Time.

properties.title: readonly element: HTMLElement
properties.description: Gets the root element of control.

value.description: Returns the root element of control.

properties.title: readonly elementHours: HTMLElement
properties.description: Gets the hours element of control.

value.description: Returns the hours element of control.

properties.title: readonly elementMinutes: HTMLElement
properties.description: Gets the minutes element of control.

value.description: Returns the minutes element of control.

properties.title: readonly elementSeconds: HTMLElement
properties.description: Gets the seconds element of control.

value.description: Returns the seconds element of control.

properties.title: readonly elementMilliseconds: HTMLElement
properties.description: Gets the miliseconds element of control.

value.description: Return the miliseconds element of control.

properties.title: value: number
properties.description: Gets or sets the value of time.

properties.title: nullable: boolean
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the value can be null; the default is true.

properties.title: max: number
properties.description: Gets or sets the maxium allowed value; the default is 86399999 (23:59:59.999)

properties.title: secondsEnabled: boolean
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the seconds element is visible.

properties.title: millisecondsEnabled: boolean
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the milliseconds element is visible.

events.title: timechange
events.description: The change event is fired when an alteration to the value is committed by the user.
